pages.title: Crimson Transform
pages.text: Crimson Mosquitoes can be transformed into Warped Mosco by feeding warped muscle while weakened

pages.title: Blooded
pages.text: Crimson Mosquitoes will gain blood level when hit by blood or a 20% chance to gain blood when spawning

pages.title: Blood Protection
pages.text: Crimson Mosquitoes is immune to blood spits
